DOC.brief_title: My Surgical Success : A Randomized Controlled Pilot Study Pre-surgical Psychological Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: Pre-surgical patient identify breast surgeon . The entire study conduct remotely in-person contact study staff . Study staff call patient invite enroll study ; inform consent obtain online . All participant ask provide baseline demographic information , well self-reported measure assess mood , pain , cognitive emotional response pain , catastrophizing , self-efficacy , medication . All measure administer via secure , HIPAA compliant , online system ( REDCap ) . Participants randomize either Internet-based pain psychology intervention ( My Surgical Success ) brief online health education ( HE Control ) . Prior surgery , participant randomize HE control group receive patient handout online health nutrition orient information relevant improve recovery surgery . The Internet-based pain psychology intervention emphasize treatment content target pain catastrophizing . My Surgical Success include psychoeducational video , downloadable audio file , downloadable PDF Personalized Plan Success . After view online treatment video , participant randomize My Surgical Success complete question regard participant satisfaction video , perceive usefulness information , likelihood use skill learn . Pain catastrophizing score collect study participant prior surgery . All participant track daily post-surgically ass pain , opioid use , distress , use skill learn treatment ; data capture daily 30 day , weekly 2 week , every 2 week 4 week pain opioid cessation ( end 12 week ) . Psychosocial data collect post-surgically week 2 , 4 , 8 , 12 . Post-treatment question : Participants My Surgical Success group complete follow question end video : understandable video , relevance , usefulness , satisfaction , likely use information , learn video . Participants HE Control ask understandable health information packet , relevance , usefulness , satisfaction , likely use information , learn packet . The pain catastrophizing scale ( PCS ) administer follow treatment surgery participant . Following surgery , participant fill online daily measure assess pain medication use . Daily measure continue participant report 3 consecutive report zero average pain zero opiate use indicate recovered surgery . Until reach endpoint , daily measure collect 30 day , bi-weekly additional 2 week , weekly period 2-6 additional week .
